briefTitle: Antidiabetic Effects of Adding a DPP-4 Inhibitor to Pre-Existing Treatment With an Incretin Mimetic in Patients With T2D
officialTitle: Antidiabetic Effects of Adding a DPP-4 Inhibitor (Sitagliptin) to Pre-Existing Treatment With an Incretin Mimetic (Liraglutide) in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Treated With Metformin
summary: Objectives: To quantify differences in control of glycemia (primary objective) and the secretion of endogenous incretin hormones (secondary objective) comparing sitagliptin or placebo added to pre-existing therapy with liraglutide and metformin

primaryOutcome.measure: Incremental Area Under the Plasma Glucose (BG) Concentration-time Profile (AUC)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 0 to 300 min post mixed meal test
